name: Anniston Museums and Gardens

name: Southern Museum of Flight

name: U.S. Space & Rocket Center

admittancePolicy: Two adults and children under 18 residing in the same household. We are closed on Tuesdays.

name: Boonshoft Museum of Discovery
admittancePolicy: All adults and children listed on the membership card of the reciprocal institution will receive a discount. Reciprocal institutions with ASTC accreditation within 90 miles of Boonshoft will be offered 50% off admission, and those outside 90 miles will be

name: Cincinnati Museum Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children 17 and under listed on the membership. Fees associated with The Robert D. Lindner Family OMNIMAX® Theater and Featured Exhibits. Photo ID is required for adults.

name: Cleveland Museum of Natural History
admittancePolicy: Two adults and all children 18 and under living in the same household, or two grandparents and all grandchildren 18 and under.

name: COSI
admittancePolicy: : Two named adults and up to four children 18 and under listed on the membership. Additional admission required for select traveling exhibitions, motion simulator rides, and/or other experiences. Advance reservations required.

name: Great Lakes Science Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults named on membership card and up to four children or grandchildren under 18.

name: Imagination Station, Toledo
admittancePolicy: Two adults and all children under 18 living in the same household.

name: McKinley Presidential Library & Museum
admittancePolicy: Mother, father, and unmarried children under 18, or grandparents and unmarried grandchildren under 18 (two-generation limit).

name: Center for Science & Technology
admittancePolicy: Four free admission, $12 admissions per person after that.

name: SPI: Where Science and Play Intersect
admittancePolicy: Up to two adults named on a current membership card and three children living within the same household. Passport visitors whose residence or home institution is within 90 miles will not qualify for free admission but may qualify for discounted admission as arranged with regional partners.

name: Technology
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children/grandchildren under 18.

name: Discovery Lab
admittancePolicy: Up to two adults named on the membership card and up to two children in the same household.

name: Science Museum Oklahoma
admittancePolicy: Two adults and two children (ages 3–12).

name: Eugene Science Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and four children living in the same household.

name: Evergreen Aviation & Space Museum
address: 500 NE Captain Michael King Smith Way
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children from the same household ages 5–16 (under 5 is always free).

name: Gilbert House Children's Museum
admittancePolicy: Two named adult cardholders and up to four named children. Additional guests must pay regular admission. Does not include special events, classes, or camps. No longer reciprocal with University of Oregon Museum of Natural and Cultural History.

name: Oregon Museum of Science and Industry
admittancePolicy: General admission for two adults and up to four children (Ages 3-17). Additional fees apply for events, theater and planetarium shows, submarine tours, and special traveling exhibits. No longer reciprocal with A.C. Gilbert House as of September 1, 2025.

name: ScienceWorks Hands-On Museum
admittancePolicy: Parents/guardians and all dependents in their household under 18.

name: Sunriver Nature Center & Observatory
admittancePolicy: Two adults and children (18 and younger) residing in the same household. Free daytime admission includes the Nature Center and daytime Observatory. Call for reservation for 50% off Public Night Observatory Programming.

name: Cultural History
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four youth (ages 3–18).

name: Carnegie Science Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and four children 3 to

name: Children's Museum of Pittsburgh
admittancePolicy: Up to two adults and up to three children in one immediate family that are listed on the reciprocal institution's membership. Not reciprocal with Carnegie Science Center or McKinley Presidential Library & Museum memberships.

name: Da Vinci Science Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children under 18 covered by the membership.

name: Discovery Space of Central Pennsylvania
admittancePolicy: Two adults and all children living in one household.

name: expERIEnce Children's Museum
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children under 18.

name: Lacawac Sanctuary Foundation
admittancePolicy: General admission for two adults and up to four children in the same household. Passport members receive 10% on the gift shop.

name: Lancaster Science Factory
admittancePolicy: Parents and children (regardless of number of family members).

name: Lewisburg Children's Museum
admittancePolicy: Free general admission for up to four (4) individuals (adults and/or children). Valid membership card and photo ID must be presented at the time of entry.

name: Moonshot Museum
admittancePolicy: General admission for up to two adults and four children; at least one adult must be named on membership card. Photo ID required.

name: National Watch & Clock Museum
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children under the age of 18 living in the same household.

name: North Museum of Nature and Science
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children or grandchildren under 18, for Museum admission only. Adult cardholders must be present and reside outside of Lancaster County, PA.

name: Reading Public Museum
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children/grandchildren (ages 4-17).

name: University
admittancePolicy: General admission for up to two named adults and up to five children under 18 listed on the reciprocal institution's membership. Does not include special exhibits or events.

name: The Franklin Institute
admittancePolicy: General admission for people covered by the membership, up to a maximum of two adults and four children (ages 3–18). Subject to nonmember upgrade prices for special exhibitions.

name: The State Museum of Pennsylvania
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children under 18 in the same household. Adult cardholders must be present. Passport privileges do not extend to non-family groups. Planetarium admission and group reservations are excluded.

name: Whitaker Center for Science and the Arts
admittancePolicy: Two adult cardholders (parents/grandparents or caregivers) and up to six juniors under 18 who live in household, full- or part-time, e.g., joint custody or parental visitation, or as designated on the membership card. Passport privileges do not include admission to Select Medical Digital Cinema.

name: Centro Criollo de Ciencia y Tecnologia del Caribe
admittancePolicy: Up to four people (adults and children) as listed on the membership card. Visitors show their card.

name: EcoExploratorio

name: Providence Children's Museum
admittancePolicy: Three people per card.

name: Roper Mountain Science Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and their children. Free admission to regular public programs. Call ahead for details.

name: South Dakota Discovery Center
admittancePolicy: All visitors are covered by home membership.

name: Washington Pavilion of Arts and Science
admittancePolicy: Two adults and all children under 18 living at the same address.

name: Adventure Science Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and four children 18 and under. Valid membership card required.

name: American Museum of Science & Energy
admittancePolicy: Two adults accompanied by their children, stepchildren, and/or grandchildren.

name: Children's Museum of Oak Ridge
admittancePolicy: Free general admission for up to two adults and four children for qualifying Group memberships (including at least one cardholder) and for one cardholder for qualifying Individual memberships. Photo ID required for cardholder.

name: Discovery Center at Murfree Spring
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children of the same household.

name: Discovery Park of America
admittancePolicy: Two adults ages 18+ and up to four children ages 4-17. (Children age 3 and under are always free.)

name: Hands On! Discovery Center
admittancePolicy: General admission for those listed on home museum membership card; children 3 and younger are free. Includes admission to Gray Fossil Site. Does not include Tesla shows or Paleo tours. Half-price for members of Passport museums within a 90-mile radius.

name: Hands-On Science Center
admittancePolicy: Parents and minor children at the same address, or grandparents and grandchildren.

name: Lichterman Nature Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and their dependent children/grandchildren under 18 (up to 10 children).

name: Memphis Museums of Science and History
admittancePolicy: Two adults and their dependent children/grandchildren under 18 (up to 10 children).

name: Muse Knoxville
admittancePolicy: All individuals covered by membership, cardholder(s) must be present.

name: Children's Museum Houston
admittancePolicy: Household family members, or grandparents and grandchildren, up to six people.

name: Corpus Christi Museum of Science & History
admittancePolicy: Family of four people.

name: Don Harrington Discovery Center
admittancePolicy: Parents, children, and stepchildren; or grandparents with grandchildren (not adult children).

name: Fort Worth Museum of Science and History
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to two children under 18 living in the same household. Does not include tickets to the Jane & John Justin Foundation Omni Theater or parking. Not valid during the Fort Worth Stock Show and Rodeo.

name: Sanctuary
admittancePolicy: Parents and children (18 and under) of the same household, or grandparents and grandchildren (18 and under), up to six people.

name: Center
admittancePolicy: Passport visitors receive free general admission.

name: Perot Museum of Nature and Science
admittancePolicy: Two adults and three children (12 and under) living in the same household.

name: Science Spectrum
admittancePolicy: Honors the number of visitors valid on the membership, up to a maximum of five (one adult listed on the membership card must attend). Passport visitors receive discounted theater and special exhibits at member ticket rates.

name: Space Center Houston
admittancePolicy: Up to two adults (ages 12+) and up to two children (ages 4–11) general admission tickets per membership; does not include special events. At least one adult (age 18+) named on valid membership card must attend. Residency rule enforced.

name: Texas Science & Natural History Museum
admittancePolicy: Free general admission for up to two named ASTC Passport Program members.

name: The Discovery Science Place
admittancePolicy: General admission for two adults (at least one must be listed on membership card) and up to four children of the same household. Excludes Maker Faire and special events.

name: The DoSeum
admittancePolicy: Free general admission for up to three guests. Must present an ID and proof of active membership.

name: The Health Museum
admittancePolicy: Household family members or grandparents and grandchildren up to six people.

name: Thinkery
admittancePolicy: Four people (one adult listed on the membership card must be present).

name: Witte Museum
admittancePolicy: Free general admission for two adults and dependent children under 18; at least one adult must be named on membership card. Special exhibitions, programs or events subject to additional charge.

name: Clark Planetarium
admittancePolicy: Free admission for up to five family members to the Hansen Dome Theatre.

name: Hutchings Museum
admittancePolicy: Any six people.

name: Natural History Museum of Utah

name: Swaner Preserve and EcoCenter
admittancePolicy: Up to two adults and three children within same household (at least one must be named on membership email).

name: USU Eastern Prehistoric Museum
admittancePolicy: Free admission to households with ASTC member card.

name: ECHO, Leahy Center for Lake Champlain
admittancePolicy: Up to four guests, need to show a membership card. (No need to distinguish between adults & children).

name: Fairbanks Museum and Planetarium
admittancePolicy: General admission for people covered by the membership, up to a maximum of two adults and four minor children.

name: Children’s Science Center Lab
admittancePolicy: Two adults plus a maximum of two children (ages 2+) for one 2 hour timed-entry per membership card. Visitors must email tickets@childsci.org to receive a discount code to reserve tickets in advance.

name: Children's Museum of Virginia
admittancePolicy: General admission for up to four (4) people OR the max number allowed on your membership, if less than four (4) people. One adult listed on the membership must be present. Valid membership card and photo ID must be presented at the time of entry. Advance online reservations required.

name: Nauticus
admittancePolicy: Four people (ages 3+).

name: Danville Science Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and three children; membership card required.

name: Science Museum of Virginia
admittancePolicy: Two adults and three children; membership card required.

name: Virginia Air and Space Science Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children. (ages 3-18).

name: Virginia Discovery Museum
admittancePolicy: Honors home museum’s definition of family (as stated by the number in family listed on card). Additional visitors pay general admission. East end of the downtown pedestrian mall. Suggested Parking: Market Street Garage (550 E Market St) or Water Street Garage (200 E Water St). First Hour free and museum validates the second hour.

name: Virginia Living Museum
admittancePolicy: Up to two member adults and two children under 18 within the same household. Special events, planetarium, and exhibits with additional fees not included. No other discounts apply.

name: Virginia Museum of Natural History
admittancePolicy: Two adults and all minor children living at the same address. Grandparents may be accompanied by grandchildren under 18.

name: KidsQuest Children's Museum
admittancePolicy: Free two full price admissions. Additional visitors pay general admission.

name: Mobius Discovery Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults per household and any four children.

name: Pacific Science Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to six youth. Additional events, IMAX movies, and certain traveling exhibits with additional fees not included.

name: Palouse Discovery Science Center
admittancePolicy: 2 Adults and Up to 6 children within the same household.

name: REACH Museum
admittancePolicy: Family Membership: two adults and up to four children up to 18. Individual Memberships: the named cardholder only can be admitted.

name: The Museum of Flight Foundation
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children/youth under 18.

name: Wenatchee Valley Museum & Cultural Center
admittancePolicy: Two adults and children or grandchildren under 18; 10% store discount.

name: Yakima Valley Museum
admittancePolicy: Two adults and children or grandchildren under 18. Two adults and children or grandchildren under 18.

name: Huntington Museum of Art
admittancePolicy: Parents with children, or grandparents with children.

name: Barlow Planetarium at UWO-Fox Cities
admittancePolicy: Free admission to any star or laser show for two adults and their children under 18 living in same household, for a single show per day. Please visit our website homepage and click on the ASTC link to reserve your tickets.

name: Building for Kids Children's Museum
admittancePolicy: Two adults and children living together in the same household at the same address.

name: Cable Natural History Museum
admittancePolicy: Free general admission for one household.

name: Children's Museum of Eau Claire
admittancePolicy: Two adults and all children in same household, listed on the membership card. Photo ID required for cardholder.

name: Children's Museum of La Crosse
admittancePolicy: Up to six people; one must be named on card.

name: Discovery World
admittancePolicy: Up to two named adult cardholders and member children age 17 and under. Photo ID with cardholder’s current home address required. General admission rates apply for additional guests.

name: EAA Aviation Museum
admittancePolicy: Two adults and their children under 18 (same household).

name: Madison Children's Museum
admittancePolicy: Up to six people listed on the membership. Valid membership card, and photo ID for cardholder, required. Some restrictions apply; call ahead for more information.

name: Milwaukee Public Museum
admittancePolicy: Two adults in the same household and children or grandchildren 17 and under. Limited to general exhibit areas only; no other discounts apply.

name: National Railroad Museum
admittancePolicy: Two adults and children/grandchildren (18 and under) in the household. Includes free train rides (May– September daily; weekends in October). Does not include ticketed special events.

name: Neville Public Museum
admittancePolicy: Two adults and their children/grandchildren under 18.

name: The Science Zone
admittancePolicy: Two adults and their children under 18 living in the same household.

name: Technology Centre
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to three children 4–16.

name: Scitech Discovery Centre

name: Bermuda Underwater Exploration Institute
admittancePolicy: Parents and up to four children living at the same household.

name: Discovery Centre
admittancePolicy: Up to two adults and five children under 18 as listed on membership card. General admission only, does not include special events, discounts, or Dome Theatre tickets.

name: Museum
admittancePolicy: Up to two adults and up to four youth under 18. General admission only. Includes Canada Aviation and Space Museum (11 Aviation Parkway, Ottawa, ON K1K 4Y5) and Canada Agriculture and Food Museum (901 Prince of Wales Drive, Ottawa, ON K2C 3K1).

name: Johnson Geo Centre
admittancePolicy: Up to two adults and three children under 18. General admission only; does not include special events, discounts, or movie tickets.

name: Markham Museum
admittancePolicy: Free general admission for up to two adults and four children, same household. Not valid for special events or pre-registered programs.

name: Montreal Science Centre
admittancePolicy: Two adults and two children, or one adult and three children. For members with family membership. Individual membership will receive one access ticket.

name: Okanagan Science Centre
admittancePolicy: Parents and children under 18 living in the same residence.

name: Rossland Museum and Discovery Centre
admittancePolicy: Two care-giving adults and immediately supervised children.

name: Saskatchewan Science Centre
admittancePolicy: Two adults and up to four children under 18 in the same household. Free admission limited to general exhibit areas; does not include traveling exhibitions or theatre shows.

name: Science North
admittancePolicy: One or two adults and their children under 18 living at same address. Admission is to the science center only.

name: Science World
admittancePolicy: Admits up to two adults and their children (maximum four), 3 to 18, named on the membership card(s). Some restrictions apply. Proof of Residence Required. General admission only. Does not include special events, discounts, or fee-based experiences.

name: TELUS Spark
admittancePolicy: General admission only for up to two adults and four children living in the same household. Does not include parking, discounts, special events, and select feature exhibitions.

name: TELUS World of Science – Edmonton
admittancePolicy: Science center general admission only. Additional fees for special exhibits apply. Does not include special events, programing, or IMAX admission.

name: Maloka - Centro Interactivo de Ciencia y Tecnologia

name: Bloomfield Science Museum Jerusalem

name: Carasso Science Park
admittancePolicy: Two adults and three children. Free admission for children under 5.

admittancePolicy: Parents and three children.

name: The Davidson Institute of Science Education
admittancePolicy: Nuclear family (two adults and children).

name: National Science Centre, Malaysia
admittancePolicy: Two adults and two children under 18. Valid for general exhibit area; does not include special exhibitions, rides, and shows.

name: Petrosains, The Discovery Centre
admittancePolicy: Two adults and two children 17 and under. Valid only for general exhibit area; does not include paid exhibits, rides, or Theatre Ungku Omar.

name: MIDE, Museo Interactivo de Economia

name: EXPLORA, Centro de Ciencias y Arte
city: Frente a la Urb. Condado del Rey
admittancePolicy: One adult and one child under 12.

name: The Mind Museum
admittancePolicy: Maximum of five free admissions.

name: Science Centre Singapore
admittancePolicy: Maximum of five free admissions. Valid only for entry into the center, not the Omni-theater.

name: Gwangju National Science Museum
admittancePolicy: Free admission--call before visit to confirm.

name: Science Museum of Kyiv - Junior Academy of Sciences of Ukraine
admittancePolicy: Choice of one-day visit admission or one-day visit + educational program admission.

name: International Centre for Life
admittancePolicy: Individual membership provides free admission for one person. Family membership provides free admission for two adults and two children, or one adult and three children. All additional people are charged regular admission.
